The FactorGraph iterator interface will be removed in future versions of libDAI

Member dai::FactorGraph::factor (size_t I)
Please use the const member dai::FactorGraph::factor( size_t ) instead, or dai::FactorGraph::setFactor() for changing a factor.

The FactorGraph iterator interface will be removed in future versions of libDAI
